mapper.select: SELECT mem_id as userId, mem_pwd as userPw, mem_name as userName, mem_phone as userHp, mem_email as userEmail, reg_date FROM tb_member
SELECT mem_id as userId, mem_pwd as userPw, mem_name as userName, mem_phone as userHp, mem_email as userEmail, reg_date FROM tb_member WHERE mem_id = #{userId}
